title: All buildings shall be provided with separate coloured bins to collect dry waste (paper, plastic, metal, glass, etc
clause_text: All buildings shall be provided with separate coloured bins to collect dry waste (paper, plastic, metal, glass, etc.) and wet waste (organic waste). Dedicated space shall be allocated for collecting waste before transferring waste for recycling/disposal separately.
